医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
睡眠呼吸暂停会增加老年女性患痴呆症的风险研究人员根据阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停的存在情况确定男性和女性患痴呆症的风险差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Sleep-apnea-raises-dementia-risk-in-older-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Sleep-apnea-raises-dementia-risk-in-older-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ccc409ed-8591-4835-aea7-b18724f0667f Wed, 06 Nov 2024 04:39:00 -0500 Sleep apnea raises dementia risk in older women
AI 驱动的 MRI 可预测前列腺癌的结果研究人员确定基于人工智能的 MRI 数据是否可以预测前列腺癌患者的预后。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/AI-powered-MRI-predicts-outcomes-in-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/AI-powered-MRI-predicts-outcomes-in-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f4c475a-4e55-4768-809d-993e4f60987e Wed, 06 Nov 2024 04:23:00 -0500 AI-powered MRI predicts outcomes in prostate cancer
人工智能在诊断方面优于医生，但在临床助理方面却表现不佳研究人员调查大型语言模型是否可以增强医生的诊断推理https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/AI-outperforms-doctors-in-diagnostics-but-falls-short-as-a-clinical-assistant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/AI-outperforms-doctors-in-diagnostics-but-falls-short-as-a-clinical-assistant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac75238e-77b2-45c5-9fab-248d60a34d49 Wed, 06 Nov 2024 04:10:00 -0500 AI outperforms doctors in diagnostics but falls short as a clinical assistant
古老草药有望对抗痴呆症如今，寻找突破性痴呆症药物的尝试可能会引起人们的关注，但传统医药产品可以为预防医学提供线索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Ancient-herb-shows-promise-in-fighting-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Ancient-herb-shows-promise-in-fighting-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf947054-297d-409a-b38b-c8454b303caf Wed, 06 Nov 2024 02:26:48 -0500 Ancient herb shows promise in fighting dementia
探索免疫细胞对代谢健康和脂肪储存的昼夜节律影响最近的研究表明，免疫系统与人体的内部时钟相互作用，影响脂肪储存和温度调节。这些见解对于因现代生活需求而工作、饮食或睡眠模式不规律的个人具有重大意义。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Exploring-the-circadian-influence-of-immune-cells-on-metabolic-health-and-fat-storage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Exploring-the-circadian-influence-of-immune-cells-on-metabolic-health-and-fat-storage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e25db19-bcca-4df4-a042-c9e6db9e6dca Wed, 06 Nov 2024 00:03:56 -0500 Exploring the circadian influence of immune cells on metabolic health and fat storage
CHiTA 测定鉴定功能性捻转核酶“RNA世界”假说提出，地球上最早的生命可能是基于RNA——；在很多方面与 DNA 相似的单链分子 -；就像一些现代病毒一样。这是因为，与 DNA 一样，RNA 可以携带遗传信息，但与蛋白质一样，它也可以充当酶，启动或加速反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/CHiTA-assay-identizes-function-twister-ribozymes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/CHiTA-assay-identizes-function-twister-ribozymes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38d93b4b-cef3-44f5-9328-a043f9ad8d6f Tue, 05 Nov 2024 23:47:25 -0500 CHiTA assay identifies functional twister ribozymes
靶向噬菌体提供标准化和可扩展的胃肠道治疗在一项新的研究中，哥本哈根大学的研究人员一直在从粪便中培养“好病毒”。目标是取代目前用于所谓粪便移植的粪便胶囊。他们的新技术在小鼠研究中显示出潜力，希望它能够通过标准化改进这种挽救生命的治疗方法，并为主流医学铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Targeted-bacteriophages-offer-standardized-and-scalable-GI-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Targeted-bacteriophages-offer-standardized-and-scalable-GI-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6edecb64-9111-4ab1-b1bf-465a690b79da Tue, 05 Nov 2024 23:30:30 -0500 Targeted bacteriophages offer standardized and scalable GI therapy
胰腺癌中 ATM 抑制剂的新型合成致死靶点胰腺癌治疗领域的一项新发现揭示了 BEND4 的表观遗传沉默可作为潜在的合成致死标记，用于增强 ATM 抑制剂在胰腺癌治疗中的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/A-novel-synthetic-lethal-target-for-ATM-inhibitors-in-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/A-novel-synthetic-lethal-target-for-ATM-inhibitors-in-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b67d9b7c-f150-49e3-aba3-ffc2398b831e Tue, 05 Nov 2024 23:21:00 -0500 A novel synthetic lethal target for ATM inhibitors in pancreatic cancer
用概率图形网络解读免疫反应机制在过去的二十年里，新技术帮助科学家生成了大量的生物数据。基因组学、转录组学、蛋白质组学和细胞计数的大规模实验可以从给定的细胞或多细胞系统产生大量数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Deciphering-the-mechanisms-of-immune-response-with-probabilistic-graphical-networks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Deciphering-the-mechanisms-of-immune-response-with-probabilistic-graphical-networks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6cc4ac0d-966a-41ff-9672-871068bcf1d1 Tue, 05 Nov 2024 23:10:09 -0500 Deciphering the mechanisms of immune response with probabilistic graphical networks
中性粒细胞减少症研究的进展可能为更好的治疗铺平道路中性粒细胞减少症是一种血液中中性粒细胞（白细胞的一种）不足的病症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Advances-in-neutropenia-research-could-pave-the-way-for-better-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Advances-in-neutropenia-research-could-pave-the-way-for-better-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d22eed1c-9504-4738-96fe-216b9dc46580 Tue, 05 Nov 2024 22:13:00 -0500 Advances in neutropenia research could pave the way for better treatments
